name: Bryant Gumbel
description:
When we found out that Bryant Gumbel is part Jewish (3/32, but who is counting!), we obviously had to profile him. But as we tried to think of all possible angles, we kept coming back to one image:

When Gumbel interviews someone and starts being really inquisitive, his glasses slide to the bottom of his nose. We just couldn't get that picture out of our head!

So here are six of them.


 

 

 


That is all.
